trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objekter i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen TreeNodeCollection brukes til å lagre og behandle en samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control uses the TreeNodeCollection class in two of its properties.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen bruker klassen TreeNodeCollection i to av køens egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: It stores its root nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> property and its selected nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den lagrer Rotnodene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>egenskapen og de valgte nodene i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection collection is also used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property to store child nodes (if any).
trans-unit.target: Samlingen TreeNodeCollection brukes også for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>til å lagre underordnede noder (Hvis noen).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Item%2A> indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object directly at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Klassen TreeNodeCollection støtter flere metoder for å få tilgang til elementer i samlingen:-Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Item%2A>indekserer til å hente en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt direkte på en bestemt nullbaserte indeksen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>metode for å opprette en opplisting som kan brukes til å gå gjennom samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk `foreach` (C#) eller `For Each` (Visual Basic) for å gå gjennom samlingen.

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection into an <xref:System.Array> object.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>metode for å kopiere innholdet i samlingen i et <xref:System.Array>objektet.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically manage the TreeNodeCollection by adding and removing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: Du kan programmatisk administrere TreeNodeCollection legge til og fjerne <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To add nodes to the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til noder i samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove nodes from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne noder fra samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collections are automatically populated each time binding occurs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>samlinger fylles ut automatisk hver gang bindingen forekommer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Any changes to the collections between bindings will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i samlinger mellom bindinger vil gå tapt.

trans-unit.source: To retain these changes, either update the data source or manually rebuild the collection each time you bind.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde disse endringene, oppdatere datakilden eller Bygg samlingen hver gang du binde manuelt.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeCollection inneholder egenskaper og metoder som gjør det mulig å hente informasjon om samlingen seg selv.

trans-unit.source: To find out how many items are in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne ut hvor mange elementer som i samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Count%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne ut om samlingen inneholder en bestemt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt, bruker du den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Contains%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To get the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Å hente indeksen for et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet i samlingen, bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IndexOf%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IndexOf%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> class using the default values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> klasse bruker standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> class using the default values.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>klasse bruker standardverdiene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of root nodes where a parent node (or owner) is not required.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren brukes vanligvis når du oppretter en samling av rotnoder der en overordnet node (eller -eier) er ikke obligatorisk.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When creating a collection of non-root nodes, you should use the overloaded constructor that takes the `owner` parameter, instead of this constructor, to specify the parent node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du oppretter en samling av ikke-rotnoder, bør du bruke overbelastet konstruktør som bruker den `owner` parameteren i stedet for denne konstruktøren, til å angi den overordnede noden.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> class using the specified parent node (or owner).
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> klasse med angitt overordnet node (eller eieren).

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> class using the specified parent node (or owner).
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>klasse med angitt overordnet node (eller eieren).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of non-root nodes where you need to specify the parent node.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren brukes vanligvis når du oppretter en samling av ikke-rotnoder der du må angi den overordnede noden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When creating a collection of root nodes, consider using the default constructor because root nodes do not have a parent node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du oppretter en samling av rotnoder, kan du vurdere å bruke Standardkonstruktøren rotnoder har ikke en overordnet node.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object that represents the parent node of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som representerer den overordnede noden i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Legger de angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet til slutten av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Add-metode til å legge til det angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet til slutten av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> allows you to add null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>kan du legge til nullreferanser (ingenting i Visual Basic), og den dupliserte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> at a specific index by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Som et alternativ, du kan sette inn en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>på en bestemt indeks ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to append.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objekt for å tilføye.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objekt i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet i den angitte indeksplasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Use the AddAt method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden AddAt å sette inn den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>i den angitte nullbaserte indeksen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> allows you to insert null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>gjør det mulig å sette inn nullreferanser (ingenting i Visual Basic), og den dupliserte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du legge en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet til slutten av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksplasseringen for innsetting av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to add.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objekt for å legge til.

trans-unit.source: child is .
trans-unit.target: childis .

trans-unit.source: Empties the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Tømmer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the Clear method to remove every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Fjern for å fjerne alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To remove an individual node from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du fjerner en enkelt node fra samlingen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet er i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Contains-metoden til å fastslå om en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet finnes i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object before performing a task, such as adding or removing the node from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis til å teste for forekomsten av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet før du utfører en oppgave, for eksempel legge til eller fjerne noden fra samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to find.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet til å finne.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object is contained in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet er befinner seg i samlingen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer alle elementer fra de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> -objekt til en kompatibel endimensjonal matrise av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objekter, med Start fra den angitte indeksen i Målmatrisen.

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> into the specified zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CopyTo-metoden til å kopiere innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>i den angitte nullbasert <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objektet.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Elementene kopieres fra den angitte indeksen på Målmatrisen.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Med <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objektet, kan du deretter bruke matrisesyntaks for å få tilgang til elementer i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>metode for å opprette en opplisting som kan brukes til å få tilgang til elementer i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En nullbasert matrise av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objekter som mottar kopierte elementer fra de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen i Målmatrisen vil begynne å motta kopierte innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Count-egenskapen til å finne ut hvor mange elementer i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when iterating through a collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis under gjentakelse en samling til å finne den øvre grensen for samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The Count property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen antall brukes også vanligvis til å finne ut om en samling er tom.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en opplisting som kan brukes til å gå gjennom en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the GetEnumerator method to create an enumerator that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk GetEnumerator-metoden til å opprette en opplisting som enkelt kan være iterated til å hente hvert element i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: To get the item currently pointed to in the enumerator, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha elementet som er angitt i enumeratoren, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden til å flytte til neste element.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you need to move the enumerator back to the beginning of the collection, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du skal flytte enumeratoren tilbake til starten av samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After you create an enumerator or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du oppretter en opplisting eller bruker den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, må du kalle den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Ellers elementet som representerer den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er ikke definert.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>metode for å opprette en <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objekt som kan brukes til å få tilgang til elementer i samlingen.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another alternative is to use a `foreach` or `For Each` structure to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Et annet alternativ er å bruke en `foreach` eller `For Each` strukturen til å gå gjennom samlingen.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En opplisting som kan brukes til å gå gjennom den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer indeksen for den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to determine the zero-based index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk IndexOf-metoden til å fastslå den nullbaserte indeksen for den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If the node is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis noden ikke er i samlingen, returnerer metoden -1.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified node appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den angitte noden vises flere ganger i samlingen, returneres indeksen for den første forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to locate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objekt for å finne.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the , if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den første forekomsten av value i den , hvis fant; ellers, -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilgang til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> er synkronisert (tråden trygt).

trans-unit.source: The IsSynchronized property is used to indicate whether access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsSynchronized brukes til å angi om tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>er synkronisert (tråden trygt).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> class and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er avledet av den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>klasse og overstyres for å returnere alltid `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om egenskapen IsSynchronized, se den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet i den angitte indeksen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> at the specified index using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne indekserer til å få tilgang til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>i den angitte indeksen matrise notasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The indexer allows you to modify or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: Indeksering kan du endre eller erstatte et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet i samlingen direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The collection is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen er null.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet i den angitte indeksen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the specified node from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Remove-metoden til å fjerne den angitte noden fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Alle elementer som følger noden flyttes å fylle ut ledige posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Indeksene i flyttet elementene også oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> can contain null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>kan inneholde nullreferanser (ingenting i Visual Basic), i tillegg dupliserte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a node at a specific index by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Som et alternativ, kan du fjerne en node i en bestemt indeks ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også fjerne alle node i samlingen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet til å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object at the specified index location from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet i den angitte indeksplasseringen fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object at the specified zero-based index location from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RemoveAt for å fjerne <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet i den angitte nullbaserte indeksplasseringen fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Alle elementer som følger noden flyttes å fylle ut ledige posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Indeksene i flyttet elementene også oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> can contain null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>kan inneholde nullreferanser (ingenting i Visual Basic), i tillegg dupliserte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fjerne en bestemt eventuelt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også fjerne alle node i samlingen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the node to remove.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen nullbaserte indeksen for å fjerne-noden.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som kan brukes til å synkronisere tilgang til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The SyncRoot property provides a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> that can be used with synchronizing (threading) code.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SyncRoot gir en synkroniserte versjon av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>som kan brukes med synkronisering (trådmodell) code.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property of this class always returns `false`, which indicates that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> class is not synchronized (not thread safe).
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > I <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>for dette klasse alltid returnerer `false`, som angir at det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>klasse er ikke synkronisert (ikke tråden trygt).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: Synchronizing code must perform operations on the SyncRoot object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>, not directly on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> itself.
trans-unit.target: Synkroniserer kode må utføre operasjoner på SyncRoot-objekt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>, ikke direkte på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>seg selv.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Dette sikrer ordentlig med samlinger som er avledet fra andre objekter.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt den opprettholder riktig synkronisering med andre tråder som kan være samtidig endring av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> object used to store the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Objektet returnerte i denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>objektet brukes til å lagre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Lister opp i en samling vil si gjelder ikke sikker.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Selv når en samling synkroniseres, kan andre tråder fortsatt endre samlingen, som fører til at enumeratoren til Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: For å garantere tråd sikkerhetsnivået under opplisting, kan du låse samlingen under hele opplistingen eller opp unntak som er et resultat av endringer foretatt av andre tråder.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>egenskapen se den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som kan brukes til å synkronisere tilgang til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer alle elementer fra de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> -objekt til en kompatibel endimensjonal <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, med Start fra den angitte indeksen i Målmatrisen.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> into the specified zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>metode for å kopiere innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>i den angitte nullbasert <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objektet.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Elementene kopieres fra den angitte indeksen på Målmatrisen.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Med <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objektet, kan du deretter bruke matrisesyntaks for å få tilgang til elementer i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>metode for å opprette en opplisting som kan brukes til å få tilgang til elementer i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En nullbasert <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> objektet som skal motta kopierte elementer fra de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen i Målmatrisen vil begynne å motta kopierte innholdet.

trans-unit.source: array is not an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: arrayer ikke en matrise av objekter.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet er lagrer endringer i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is marked to save its state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er merket for å lagre tilstanden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object's previously saved view state.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objektet tidligere lagrede visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved view state values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder verdiene lagrede visningen.

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to view state to a <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer endringer for å vise statusen til en <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the view state changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder visningen tilstandsendringer.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> to track changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: Angir at det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> å spore endringer i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: After this method has been called on a server control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden er kalt på en serverkontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>egenskapen returnere `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>
